00028    /*
00029    * Read random seed and initialize.
00030    */
00031    void Random::readParam(std::istream &in)
00032    {
00033       readBegin(in, "Random");
00034       read<SeedType>(in, "seed", seed_);
00035       setSeed();
00036       readEnd(in);
00037    }
00038 
00039    /*
00040    * Sets of random seed, and initializes random number generator.
00041    *
00042    * \param seed value for random seed (private member variable seed)
00043    */
00044    void Random::setSeed(Random::SeedType seed)
00045    {
00046       seed_ = seed;
00047       setSeed();
00048    }
00049 
00050    /*
00051    * If seed_ == 0, use a seed taken from the clock. Otherwise, use
00052    * seed_ as an integer seed for the random number generator.
00053    */
00054    void Random::setSeed()
00055    {
00056       // If seed  == 0, replace with random seed from clock.
00057       if (seed_ == 0) {
00058          SeedType temp;
00059          //temp = static_cast<SeedType>(std::time(0)); 
00060          timeval time;
00061          gettimeofday(&time, NULL);
00062          temp = time.tv_sec + 1123*time.tv_usec;
00063          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00064          if (MPI::Is_initialized()) {
00065             SeedType rank = MPI::COMM_WORLD.Get_rank();
00066             temp += rank*(31 + time.tv_usec);
00067          }
00068          #endif
00069          engine_.seed(temp);
00070       } else {
00071          engine_.seed(seed_);
00072       }
00073       isInitialized_ = true;
00074    }
00075 
00076    /*
00077    * Return Gaussian distributed random number.
00078    */
00079    double Random::gaussian(void)
00080    {
00081       static bool   iset = false;
00082       static double zGauss1;
00083       double zGauss2;
00084 
00085       if (iset == false) {
00086          double v1;
00087          double v2;
00088          double rsq=2.0;
00089 
00090          while( rsq >= 1.0) {
00091             v1 = 2.0*uniform(-1.0, 1.0);
00092             v2 = 2.0*uniform(-1.0, 1.0);
00093             rsq = v1*v1 + v2*v2;
00094          }
00095          double fac = sqrt(-2.0*log(rsq)/rsq);
00096          zGauss1 = v1*fac;
00097          zGauss2 = v2*fac;
00098          iset = true;
00099       } else {
00100          zGauss2 = zGauss1;
00101          iset = false;
00102       }
00103       return zGauss2;
00104    }
00105 
00106    /*
00107    * unit vector with uniform probability over the unit sphere
00108    */
00109    void Random::unitVector(Vector& v)
00110    {
00111       double ran1=0, ran2=0, ranh;
00112       double ransq;
00113 
00114       ransq=2.0;
00115       while (ransq >= 1.0) {
00116          ran1  = 1.0-2.0*uniform(0.0, 1.0);
00117          ran2  = 1.0-2.0*uniform(0.0, 1.0);
00118          ransq = ran1*ran1 + ran2*ran2;
00119       }
00120       ranh= 2.0*sqrt(1.0-ransq);
00121       v[0] = ran1*ranh;
00122       v[1] = ran2*ranh;
00123       v[2] = 1.0 - 2.0*ransq;
00124    }
